name: Second Second
description: Second Second is a Roguelike card game without drawing cards. Explore randomly generated worlds, defeat monsters, collect valuable cards and add the best ones to your deck. The battles are not based on luck, so prepare to put your skills to the test.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.2Ghz or faster Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb Dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
